thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 4 of 137
thread.title: Mara Elaine

author: Mara Elaine
title: Mara Elaine
text: I had never left my dog with anyone but my family, and we both had a GREAT experience with DogVacay. The experience was simple, easy and enjoyable. I have too many good things to say about my sitter herself, but the DogVacay platform made it easy for me to review and find someone I would trust. The communication platform makes it easy for users to get in touch directly (and quickly) with the sitters. I will absolutely use DogVacay again.
